lp_review_1: Shaktipath helped me start my WhatsApp boutique in just 3 days. The lessons are so easy to follow!
lp_review_2: I got my first freelance data entry gig thanks to the Gig Finder tool. Highly recommended.

learning_paths_subtitle: Follow a guided path to master a complete skillset.
path_foundational_desc: Essential skills for using smartphones and computers for work.
path_digital_marketing_desc: Master the skills needed to manage a local business's entire online presence.
path_va_desc: Become an online office assistant for businesses.
path_local_biz_desc: Help local shops get online and manage customers.
path_ai_desc: Learn to use AI tools for work and life.
path_business_ops_desc: Learn how to manage business operations efficiently.
path_content_writing_desc: Master the art of writing content for the web.
course_smartphone_desc: Internet safety, email, and file storage basics.
course_computer_desc: Typing, word processing, and file management.
course_freelance_desc: Your path to financial freedom: Skills, Tools, and Safety.
course_money_desc: Simple money skills to earn, save, and grow safely.
course_data_entry_desc: Google Sheets basics and data cleaning.
course_ai_basics_desc: What is AI and what it isn't.
course_ai_tools_desc: AI in Canva, Docs, and more.
course_ai_project_desc: Solve a real problem with AI.
course_content_creation_desc: Plan, write, and repurpose content that helps real shops get customers.
assignment_foundational_desc: Create a mini-project to show you are job-ready. Upload screenshots of: 1. A Google Doc (Bio), 2. A Professional Email draft, 3. A Google Drive folder.
assignment_foundational_crit1_desc: Doc has clear title + 5‚Äì8 lines of text, readable formatting.
assignment_foundational_crit2_desc: Email has subject, greeting, body, and looks professional.
assignment_foundational_crit3_desc: Folder created with clear name; contains files.
assignment_computer_desc: Upload screenshots of: 1. A document (Intro + bullets), 2. A professional email draft, 3. An organized folder with files.
assignment_computer_crit1_desc: Has title, 5‚Äì8 lines of text, and bullet points.
assignment_computer_crit2_desc: Includes subject, greeting, clear body, and closing.
assignment_computer_crit3_desc: Folder created with clear name and contains at least 2 files.
assignment_english_desc: Upload screenshots of: 1. A Google Doc (Bio), 2. A professional email draft, 3. A Google Drive folder.
assignment_english_crit1_desc: Doc has clear title + 5 complete lines of text.
assignment_english_crit2_desc: Email has subject, greeting, short request, and thank you.
assignment_english_crit3_desc: Folder created with clear name; contains Bio document.
assignment_freelance_project_desc: Goal: Show you are ready for your first client. Upload 4 screenshots: 1. Google Doc mini-portfolio, 2. Canva poster sample, 3. Professional pitch message, 4. Google Drive folder.
assignment_freelance_crit1_desc: Are the samples clear, readable, and neat?
assignment_freelance_crit2_desc: Is the pitch message polite, simple, and error-free?
assignment_freelance_crit3_desc: Are files stored correctly in Google Drive?
assignment_freelance_crit4_desc: Did you avoid paid application traps?
assignment_va_desc: Perform a simulated VA task. Upload screenshots of: 1. A clean spreadsheet, 2. A research summary doc, 3. A polite customer reply draft.
assignment_local_biz_desc: Create a digital plan for a local shop. Upload screenshots of: 1. A Google Maps listing draft, 2. A WhatsApp Business catalog item, 3. A simple flyer idea.
assignment_ai_desc: Use AI to solve a problem. Upload screenshots of: 1. Your prompt to the AI, 2. The useful output from AI, 3. How you applied it (e.g. final text or image).
assignment_ai_crit3_desc: Did you use the result effectively?
assignment_money_desc: Create a mini-project to show you are money-smart. Upload 4 screenshots: 1. Expense tracker, 2. Weekly budget, 3. Sample invoice, 4. UPI payment-ready screen (hide sensitive info).
assignment_money_crit1_desc: Did you clearly track income and expenses?
assignment_money_crit2_desc: Is the budget realistic and simple?
assignment_money_crit3_desc: Do you know how to receive payments safely?
assignment_money_crit4_desc: Is your invoice clear and complete?
course_canva_desc: Design social media posts for digital marketing.
course_whatsapp_desc: Setup a professional presence to manage orders.
course_reels_desc: Create engaging short videos for social media.
course_google_profile_desc: Get your customers found on Google Maps & Search.
course_cw_desc: Write engaging text for social media, blogs, and websites.
assignment_canva_desc: Design 3 distinct social media posts for a fictional 'Seema's Salon' or a local business of your choice. 1. Sale Announcement (Text-heavy). 2. Product/Service Showcase (Image-heavy). 3. Customer Testimonial (Trust-building). Ensure consistent brand colors.
assignment_canva_crit1_desc: Is the most important information (Sale/Offer) the biggest element?
assignment_canva_crit2_desc: Do all 3 posts look like they come from the same brand (colors, fonts)?
assignment_canva_crit3_desc: Is the text easy to read against the background?
assignment_upload_desc: Please upload 3 image files for your project. Supported formats: PNG, JPG.
assignment_error_file_type: Invalid file type. Please upload only PNG or JPG files.
review_verdict_excellent: Excellent work! Your designs are professional and hit all the key criteria. You have a great eye for design.
review_verdict_good: Good job! You have a solid grasp of the principles. There's some room for polish, but this is a strong submission.
review_verdict_needs_improvement: A good start! You've got the basics, but your work could be improved by focusing more on the feedback provided. Review the lessons and try again!
status_server_error_p1: The application could not connect to the backend server.
status_server_error_p2: Please ensure the backend server (`gemini-backend/server.js`) is running and accessible.
status_db_error_p1: The backend server is running, but it failed to connect to the MongoDB database. This is a common issue and usually easy to fix!
status_db_error_li1: DATABASE_URL in `.env` file: Ensure the connection string is correct.
status_db_error_li2: MongoDB Atlas IP Whitelist: Ensure your current IP address is added to the IP Access List.
status_db_error_p3: After checking these settings, please restart the backend server.
progress_badges_empty: Start learning to unlock your first badge!
community_subtitle: Connect, share, and grow with other learners.
community_challenge_desc: Create a 3-post campaign for a local sweet shop.
community_challenge_full_desc: Diwali and wedding season are around the corner! Small businesses need help designing festive posts. In this challenge, you will create a cohesive 3-post campaign for a fictional sweet shop named 'Royal Sweets'.
community_challenge_rules:
1. Create 3 posts (1 teaser, 1 product showcase, 1 sale announcement).
2. Use consistent colors (Gold, Red, or Orange).
3. Submit as PNG/JPG or PDF.
community_challenge_prize: Top 3 winners get a 'Top Designer' profile badge and a 1-on-1 mentorship call.
post_content_1: Just finished my first Canva design! It was easier than I thought. üé® #Shaktipath #NewSkills
post_content_2: Check out this new logo I made for my sister's boutique. Used the 'Contrast' rule from Lesson 2. What do you think?
post_content_3: Can anyone help me with the WhatsApp Business setup? I'm stuck on the catalog part.
community_ask_placeholder: Ask a question or share something...
career_subtitle: AI tools to help you find and win work.
career_tool_gig_finder_desc: Search Google Maps & Pitch to the New Client nearby you.
career_tool_gig_launchpad_desc: Build your freelance profile for Fiverr.
circle_design_desc: Share your Canva designs and get feedback.
circle_business_desc: Support for starting your own business.
course_sm_audience_text: Girls and young women using affordable Android phones.
course_sm_outcomes_title: By the end of this course, learners can
course_sm_outcome_1: Use phone navigation confidently (buttons or gestures).
course_sm_outcome_2: Connect to WiFi/mobile data and control data use.
course_sm_outcome_3: Set up basic safety: screen lock, safe passwords, scam awareness.
course_sm_outcome_4: Install trustworthy apps and manage permissions.
course_sm_outcome_5: Write a simple professional email with an attachment.
course_sm_outcome_6: Create and save a Google Doc.
course_sm_outcome_7: Organize files into folders and upload/share in Google Drive.
course_comp_audience_text: Girls and young women starting their digital journey.
course_comp_outcomes_title: By the end of this course, you will
course_comp_outcome_1: Confidently use a keyboard and mouse.
course_comp_outcome_2: Identify and use desktop and laptop computers.
course_comp_outcome_3: Create, save, and organize files and folders.
course_comp_outcome_5: Create documents using word processing software.
course_comp_outcome_6: Browse the internet safely and effectively.
course_english_audience_text: Anyone starting to learn English for work.
course_english_outcomes_title: By the end of this course, you will
course_english_outcome_4: Write a simple professional message/email draft.
course_english_outcome_5: Use numbers, dates, and times correctly.
course_english_outcome_7: Use English for WhatsApp and phone calls.
course_english_format_3: Mini tasks to practice speaking and writing
course_freelance_audience_text: Women and students in rural India starting their financial independence journey.
course_freelance_outcomes_title: By the end of this course, you will
course_freelance_outcome_2: Identify skills you can sell using just a phone.
course_freelance_outcome_3: Set up a professional digital toolkit (Gmail, Drive).
course_freelance_outcome_4: Find safe work on platforms like Internshala.
course_freelance_outcome_5: Avoid scams and fake registration fees.
course_money_audience_text: Freelancers girls and women starting their financial journey.
course_money_outcomes_title: By the end of this course, you will
course_money_outcome_4: Receive freelancing payments safely via UPI.
course_cw_audience_text: Aspiring writers, students, and homemakers who want to earn money writing from home.
course_cw_outcome_4: Using AI tools (like ChatGPT) to write faster
course_cc_audience_text: Small business owners and social media managers who want to plan content without stress.
course_cc_outcomes_5: Repurposing one idea into many formats
course_canva_audience_text: Anyone who wants to design professional posters and posts using just a smartphone.
course_wa_audience_text: Shop owners, home bakers, and resellers who want to manage orders professionally.
course_reels_audience_text: Influencers and businesses who want to grow on Instagram using video.
course_gbp_audience_text: Local shops (Salons, Clinics, Kirana) that want to appear on Google Maps.
course_va_tools_audience_text: Anyone wanting to start an office job or work from home as a Data Entry Clerk.
course_va_admin_audience_text: Organized individuals who want to help executives or business owners manage their work.
course_va_res_audience_text: Curious minds who love finding information and want to offer 'Lead Generation' services.
course_va_client_audience_text: Freelancers who want to keep clients happy and get paid on time.
course_va_ai_audience_text: Smart workers who want to do 8 hours of work in 1 hour using AI.
assignment_content_creation_desc: Create a 1-week content calendar for a local business (e.g. Salon, Tailor). Upload: 1. A calendar table (Mon-Sun) showing 3 posts with their 'Pillars' (e.g. Education, Offer). 2. A written caption for one of the posts including Hook and Call to Action.
assignment_content_creation_crit1_desc: Are the business, audience, and goal clearly defined?
assignment_content_creation_crit2_desc: Are content buckets used and the calendar logical?
assignment_content_creation_crit3_desc: Did you include safety steps for online interactions?
assignment_wa_desc: Set up a professional WhatsApp Business profile. Upload 3 screenshots: 1. Profile Info (Logo, Description, Address, Map Pin). 2. Catalog with at least 2 products (Images + Price). 3. Automated Greeting Message setup.
assignment_wa_crit1_desc: Does profile have photo, name, and description?
assignment_wa_crit2_desc: Is product photo clear and price visible?
assignment_wa_crit3_desc: Is the greeting message polite and helpful?
assignment_cc_desc: Edit a 15-30 second video reel promoting a product or tip. Must include: 1. A 'Hook' in the first 3 seconds. 2. On-screen captions for silent viewing. 3. Background music. 4. At least one transition. Upload screenshots of your timeline showing these layers.
assignment_cc_crit1_desc: Does the video start with action or a question?
assignment_cc_crit2_desc: Are there captions and music synced to the video?
assignment_cc_crit3_desc: Are the cuts tight (no boring pauses)?
assignment_gbp_desc: Setup or update a Google Business Profile. Upload 3 screenshots: 1. Profile Home (showing name/verified), 2. 'Info' tab with hours, 3. A review or update posted.
assignment_gbp_crit1_desc: Is the business visible or in verification?
assignment_cw_desc: Create a mini-portfolio for a home bakery. Upload one document containing: 1. An Instagram Caption (with Hook, Story, CTA). 2. A short Blog Intro (100 words). 3. A Service Description.
assignment_cw_crit1_desc: Is the writing simple, clear, and friendly?
assignment_cw_crit2_desc: Does it have a strong Hook and clear CTA?
assignment_cw_crit3_desc: Are there spelling mistakes? Is it formatted well?
